title: Amend Pensions Reliefs
description: Allows the amendments of pensions reliefs

pensionReliefs.description: Object that holds the key value for pensions reliefs on.

regularPensionContributions.description:
The amount of regular pension contributions.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

oneOffPensionContributionsPaid.description:
The amount of the one off pensions contribution.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

retirementAnnuityPayments.description:
The amount of retirement annuity received.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

paymentToEmployersSchemeNoTaxRelief.description:
The amount of payments to employers scheme.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

overseasPensionSchemeContributions.description:
The amount of overseas pension scheme contributions.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
